content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254992,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一分は疎開しているが、ほとんどの者は街や村に残っている","translatedEnglishLine":"About one minute ago they evacuated, but most people remain in towns and villages."},{"lineNumber":254993,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物もリーザス軍との戦いで手一杯で街を攻撃している暇はまだ無い","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters are fully occupied fighting the Leazas army and don't have time yet to attack the towns."},{"lineNumber":254994,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですが、この魔軍の支配地域の街や村はいざ魔軍が攻めてきてもリーザス軍が守る事は","translatedEnglishLine":"However, even if the demon army attacks the towns and villages in its controlled area,"},{"lineNumber":254995,"originalJapaneseLine":"　難しいので危険な状態にある事には違い無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"it is difficult for the Leazas army to defend them, so it is definitely a dangerous situation."},{"lineNumber":254996,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中、この先のカクテル迷宮という所、ご存じですか","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way, do you know the place called the Cocktail Labyrinth ahead?"},{"lineNumber":254997,"originalJapaneseLine":"３ヶ月に一度、確実に幸福きゃんきゃんが発生するポイントがあるのです","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a point there where once every three months, a guaranteed 'Happy Kyankyan' event occurs."},{"lineNumber":254998,"originalJapaneseLine":"普段は大人気で、その時期になると冒険者が山のように押し寄せて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Normally it is very popular, and during that time adventurers flock there like a mountain,"},{"lineNumber":254999,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦える確率なんてほとんど無いのですが、今は非常時","translatedEnglishLine":"so the chance to fight is almost none, but now is an emergency."},{"lineNumber":255000,"originalJapaneseLine":"カクテル迷宮も魔軍の勢力下なのでたぶん誰もいません","translatedEnglishLine":"The Cocktail Labyrinth is also under the demon army's control, so probably no one is there."},{"lineNumber":255001,"originalJapaneseLine":"途中寄ってみます？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we stop by on the way?"},{"lineNumber":255002,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいねーと寄る気になるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance agrees, saying \"Sounds good,\" willing to stop by."},{"lineNumber":255003,"originalJapaneseLine":"旅の道中、キャンプ","translatedEnglishLine":"On the journey, camp."},{"lineNumber":255004,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがメルフェイスを狙って会いに行くと","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance aims to meet Melphys,"},{"lineNumber":255005,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジャロとふたりで出てくる、いかにも直前までセックスしていたような雰囲気・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Melphys comes out with Jaro, and it looks as if they had been having sex until just before."},{"lineNumber":255006,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスはあまり気分がよさそうではない、悲しそう","translatedEnglishLine":"Melphys doesn't seem very happy; she looks sad."},{"lineNumber":255007,"originalJapaneseLine":"対象にジャロはすっきりで威張っている感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"On the other hand, Jaro looks refreshed and arrogant."},{"lineNumber":255008,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・むむむ、むかつく","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmph, that's irritating."},{"lineNumber":255009,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＩＦ．\"オーロラが居る\"","translatedEnglishLine":"IF. \"Aurora is here\""},{"lineNumber":255010,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍レキシントン司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at the demon army Lexington headquarters,"},{"lineNumber":255011,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tオーロラが侵入してアトランタ、ジュノーから情報を聞き出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Aurora infiltrates and extracts information from Atlanta and Juno."},{"lineNumber":255012,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレキシントンは偽者かも？","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington might be an impostor?"},{"lineNumber":255013,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中、かなみか偵察部隊の報告","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way, Kanamika reconnaissance team reports."},{"lineNumber":255014,"originalJapaneseLine":"４００ほどの魔物部隊が近くに居る。","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a demon unit of about 400 nearby."},{"lineNumber":255015,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達を見つけ攻撃に来た訳ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"They did not spot us and come to attack."},{"lineNumber":255016,"originalJapaneseLine":"近くにあるアペムンタ村を狙っているみたい","translatedEnglishLine":"They seem to be targeting Apemunta Village nearby."},{"lineNumber":255017,"originalJapaneseLine":"アペムンタ村、確かにあるな、人口２００ほどの村か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Apemunta Village, yes it exists, a village with about 200 people..."},{"lineNumber":255018,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の勢力範囲に飲み込まれたが逃げずにいるみたいだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was swallowed by the demon army's territory, but it seems they have not fled."},{"lineNumber":255019,"originalJapaneseLine":"助けにいきたい所だが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to help them, but..."},{"lineNumber":255020,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス殿は魔人退治が優先ですと誰かに言われる","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone tells that for Lord Rance, exterminating demons is the priority."},{"lineNumber":255021,"originalJapaneseLine":"それにこの後、幸福きゃんきゃんが涌くカクテル迷宮に寄る予定だったと","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, it was planned to stop at the Cocktail Labyrinth where Happy Kyankyan spawns later."},{"lineNumber":255022,"originalJapaneseLine":"思いますが寄り道すると涌き時間に間に合わなくなりますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"They think that if they detour, they won't make it in time for spawn."},{"lineNumber":255023,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジャロ（空気読めない男）、ぽつりという、ああアペムンタ村って","translatedEnglishLine":"Jaro (a guy who can't read the atmosphere) mutters, “Ah, Apemunta Village is...”"},{"lineNumber":255024,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前の故郷じゃなかった、メルフェイスよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your hometown, wasn't it, Melphys?"},{"lineNumber":255025,"originalJapaneseLine":"黙っているメルフェイス","translatedEnglishLine":"Melphys remains silent."},{"lineNumber":255026,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほう・・メルフェイスちゃんの故郷か、これは、助けて恩を売るチャンスかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh... Melphys's hometown, huh? This might be a chance to help and earn some favor."},{"lineNumber":255027,"originalJapaneseLine":"アペムンタ村に行く事に決めた","translatedEnglishLine":"They decide to go to Apemunta Village."},{"lineNumber":255028,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスの方を見てウィンク（？）","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance looks at Melphys and winks (?)."},{"lineNumber":255029,"originalJapaneseLine":"村に行く途中、メルフェイスの故郷、アペムンタ村の話","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way to the village, talk about Melphys’s hometown, Apemunta Village."},{"lineNumber":255030,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカあたりが説明かな","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps Chaka explains it."},{"lineNumber":255031,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカは表面上の事は知っていますが、呪いの事は知りません","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka knows the surface facts but not about the curse."},{"lineNumber":255032,"originalJapaneseLine":"軍属でなくその村の先生だった","translatedEnglishLine":"He was not military, but a teacher in that village."},{"lineNumber":255033,"originalJapaneseLine":"５年前にヘルマン軍が来た際にその村も小数のヘルマン兵に襲われた","translatedEnglishLine":"Five years ago when the Helman army came, that village was also attacked by a small number of Helman soldiers."},{"lineNumber":255034,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、メルフェイスは魔法の力に覚醒してヘルマン軍を追い払う英雄となった","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Melphys awakened magical powers and became a hero driving off the Helman army."},{"lineNumber":255035,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまでは魔法はほとんど知らなかったというのに天才とはこういう事を言うのだねとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though she hardly knew magic before, this is what you call a genius, they say."},{"lineNumber":255036,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスはあまり話したくなさそうな感じ・・　いえ、私は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Melphys seems reluctant to talk much... No, I..."},{"lineNumber":255037,"originalJapaneseLine":"（キャラ設定：メルフェイス参照）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Character setting: See Melphys)"},{"lineNumber":255038,"originalJapaneseLine":"村に到着する、周囲を魔軍が取り囲んでいた","translatedEnglishLine":"They arrive at the village, which is surrounded by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":255039,"originalJapaneseLine":"襲われる直前だったようだ、間に合った。","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like they were about to be attacked; they made it in time."},{"lineNumber":255040,"originalJapaneseLine":"けちらせーと攻撃をしかける","translatedEnglishLine":"They launch an attack shouting 'Drive them off!'"},{"lineNumber":255041,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵のリーダーは魔物隊長","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy leader is the monster captain."},{"lineNumber":255042,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":255043,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍を率いていた魔物隊長が死に、魔軍は逃げて行った","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster captain leading the demon army was killed, and the demon army retreated."},{"lineNumber":255044,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物に襲われると怯えていた村人が感謝してくる","translatedEnglishLine":"The villagers who had been afraid of monster attacks thank them."},{"lineNumber":255045,"originalJapaneseLine":"村人の何人かがメルフェイスに気が付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Some villagers notice Melphys."},{"lineNumber":255046,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスより、メルフェイスに感謝する。","translatedEnglishLine":"They thank Melphys rather than Rance."},{"lineNumber":255047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村の救世主、そして出世頭でもあるので","translatedEnglishLine":"She is the village’s savior and most successful person."},{"lineNumber":255048,"originalJapaneseLine":"１５歳の少年アマデス君が現れる、メルフェイスとの再会に","translatedEnglishLine":"A 15-year-old boy, Amades, appears, joyfully reunited with Melphys."},{"lineNumber":255049,"originalJapaneseLine":"喜び慕ってくるが、ジャロが妨害する。","translatedEnglishLine":"He is happy and adoring, but Jaro interferes."},{"lineNumber":255050,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、俺の前にメルフェイスの面倒を見ていた少年てお前か","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, you’re the boy who took care of Melphys before me?"},{"lineNumber":255051,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう必要ないんだよ、俺がいるからなと","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re no longer needed; because I’m here now."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一分は疎開しているが、ほとんどの者は街や村に残っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About one minute ago they evacuated, but most people remain in towns and villages.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物もリーザス軍との戦いで手一杯で街を攻撃している暇はまだ無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters are fully occupied fighting the Leazas army and don't have time yet to attack the towns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、この魔軍の支配地域の街や村はいざ魔軍が攻めてきてもリーザス軍が守る事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, even if the demon army attacks the towns and villages in its controlled area,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 難しいので危険な状態にある事には違い無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is difficult for the Leazas army to defend them, so it is definitely a dangerous situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、この先のカクテル迷宮という所、ご存じですか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, do you know the place called the Cocktail Labyrinth ahead?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３ヶ月に一度、確実に幸福きゃんきゃんが発生するポイントがあるのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a point there where once every three months, a guaranteed 'Happy Kyankyan' event occurs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は大人気で、その時期になると冒険者が山のように押し寄せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normally it is very popular, and during that time adventurers flock there like a mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦える確率なんてほとんど無いのですが、今は非常時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so the chance to fight is almost none, but now is an emergency.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カクテル迷宮も魔軍の勢力下なのでたぶん誰もいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Cocktail Labyrinth is also under the demon army's control, so probably no one is there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中寄ってみます？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we stop by on the way?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいねーと寄る気になるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance agrees, saying "Sounds good," willing to stop by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅の道中、キャンプ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the journey, camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがメルフェイスを狙って会いに行くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance aims to meet Melphys,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロとふたりで出てくる、いかにも直前までセックスしていたような雰囲気・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys comes out with Jaro, and it looks as if they had been having sex until just before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスはあまり気分がよさそうではない、悲しそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys doesn't seem very happy; she looks sad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対象にジャロはすっきりで威張っている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the other hand, Jaro looks refreshed and arrogant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・むむむ、むかつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmph, that's irritating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．"オーロラが居る"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: IF. "Aurora is here"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍レキシントン司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army Lexington headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーロラが侵入してアトランタ、ジュノーから情報を聞き出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aurora infiltrates and extracts information from Atlanta and Juno.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは偽者かも？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington might be an impostor?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、かなみか偵察部隊の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, Kanamika reconnaissance team reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４００ほどの魔物部隊が近くに居る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a demon unit of about 400 nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達を見つけ攻撃に来た訳ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They did not spot us and come to attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くにあるアペムンタ村を狙っているみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They seem to be targeting Apemunta Village nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アペムンタ村、確かにあるな、人口２００ほどの村か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apemunta Village, yes it exists, a village with about 200 people...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勢力範囲に飲み込まれたが逃げずにいるみたいだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was swallowed by the demon army's territory, but it seems they have not fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けにいきたい所だが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to help them, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿は魔人退治が優先ですと誰かに言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tells that for Lord Rance, exterminating demons is the priority.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにこの後、幸福きゃんきゃんが涌くカクテル迷宮に寄る予定だったと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, it was planned to stop at the Cocktail Labyrinth where Happy Kyankyan spawns later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いますが寄り道すると涌き時間に間に合わなくなりますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They think that if they detour, they won't make it in time for spawn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロ（空気読めない男）、ぽつりという、ああアペムンタ村って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro (a guy who can't read the atmosphere) mutters, “Ah, Apemunta Village is...”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の故郷じゃなかった、メルフェイスよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your hometown, wasn't it, Melphys?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黙っているメルフェイス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys remains silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう・・メルフェイスちゃんの故郷か、これは、助けて恩を売るチャンスかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... Melphys's hometown, huh? This might be a chance to help and earn some favor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アペムンタ村に行く事に決めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decide to go to Apemunta Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスの方を見てウィンク（？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance looks at Melphys and winks (?).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村に行く途中、メルフェイスの故郷、アペムンタ村の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the village, talk about Melphys’s hometown, Apemunta Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカあたりが説明かな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps Chaka explains it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカは表面上の事は知っていますが、呪いの事は知りません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka knows the surface facts but not about the curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍属でなくその村の先生だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was not military, but a teacher in that village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５年前にヘルマン軍が来た際にその村も小数のヘルマン兵に襲われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Five years ago when the Helman army came, that village was also attacked by a small number of Helman soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、メルフェイスは魔法の力に覚醒してヘルマン軍を追い払う英雄となった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Melphys awakened magical powers and became a hero driving off the Helman army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでは魔法はほとんど知らなかったというのに天才とはこういう事を言うのだねとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though she hardly knew magic before, this is what you call a genius, they say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスはあまり話したくなさそうな感じ・・　いえ、私は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys seems reluctant to talk much... No, I...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （キャラ設定：メルフェイス参照）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Character setting: See Melphys)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村に到着する、周囲を魔軍が取り囲んでいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the village, which is surrounded by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 襲われる直前だったようだ、間に合った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like they were about to be attacked; they made it in time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けちらせーと攻撃をしかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They launch an attack shouting 'Drive them off!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵のリーダーは魔物隊長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy leader is the monster captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を率いていた魔物隊長が死に、魔軍は逃げて行った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain leading the demon army was killed, and the demon army retreated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に襲われると怯えていた村人が感謝してくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The villagers who had been afraid of monster attacks thank them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人の何人かがメルフェイスに気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some villagers notice Melphys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスより、メルフェイスに感謝する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They thank Melphys rather than Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の救世主、そして出世頭でもあるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is the village’s savior and most successful person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １５歳の少年アマデス君が現れる、メルフェイスとの再会に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A 15-year-old boy, Amades, appears, joyfully reunited with Melphys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 喜び慕ってくるが、ジャロが妨害する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is happy and adoring, but Jaro interferes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、俺の前にメルフェイスの面倒を見ていた少年てお前か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, you’re the boy who took care of Melphys before me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう必要ないんだよ、俺がいるからなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re no longer needed; because I’m here now.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

they made it in time."},{"lineNumber":255040,"originalJapaneseLine":"けちらせーと攻撃をしかける","translatedEnglishLine":"They launch an attack shouting 'Drive them off!'"},{"lineNumber":255041,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵のリーダーは魔物隊長","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy leader is the monster captain."},{"lineNumber":255042,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":255043,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍を率いていた魔物隊長が死に、魔軍は逃げて行った","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster captain leading the demon army was killed, and the demon army retreated."},{"lineNumber":255044,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物に襲われると怯えていた村人が感謝してくる","translatedEnglishLine":"The villagers who had been afraid of monster attacks thank them."},{"lineNumber":255045,"originalJapaneseLine":"村人の何人かがメルフェイスに気が付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Some villagers notice Melphys."},{"lineNumber":255046,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスより、メルフェイスに感謝する。","translatedEnglishLine":"They thank Melphys rather than Rance."},{"lineNumber":255047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村の救世主、そして出世頭でもあるので","translatedEnglishLine":"She is the village’s savior and most successful person."},{"lineNumber":255048,"originalJapaneseLine":"１５歳の少年アマデス君が現れる、メルフェイスとの再会に","translatedEnglishLine":"A 15-year-old boy, Amades, appears, joyfully reunited with Melphys."},{"lineNumber":255049,"originalJapaneseLine":"喜び慕ってくるが、ジャロが妨害する。","translatedEnglishLine":"He is happy and adoring, but Jaro interferes."},{"lineNumber":255050,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、俺の前にメルフェイスの面倒を見ていた少年てお前か","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, you’re the boy who took care of Melphys before me?"},{"lineNumber":255051,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう必要ないんだよ、俺がいるからなと","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re no longer needed; because I’m here now."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一分は疎開しているが、ほとんどの者は街や村に残っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About one minute ago they evacuated, but most people remain in towns and villages.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物もリーザス軍との戦いで手一杯で街を攻撃している暇はまだ無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters are fully occupied fighting the Leazas army and don't have time yet to attack the towns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、この魔軍の支配地域の街や村はいざ魔軍が攻めてきてもリーザス軍が守る事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, even if the demon army attacks the towns and villages in its controlled area,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 難しいので危険な状態にある事には違い無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is difficult for the Leazas army to defend them, so it is definitely a dangerous situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、この先のカクテル迷宮という所、ご存じですか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, do you know the place called the Cocktail Labyrinth ahead?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３ヶ月に一度、確実に幸福きゃんきゃんが発生するポイントがあるのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a point there where once every three months, a guaranteed 'Happy Kyankyan' event occurs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は大人気で、その時期になると冒険者が山のように押し寄せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normally it is very popular, and during that time adventurers flock there like a mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦える確率なんてほとんど無いのですが、今は非常時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so the chance to fight is almost none, but now is an emergency.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カクテル迷宮も魔軍の勢力下なのでたぶん誰もいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Cocktail Labyrinth is also under the demon army's control, so probably no one is there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中寄ってみます？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we stop by on the way?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいねーと寄る気になるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance agrees, saying "Sounds good," willing to stop by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅の道中、キャンプ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the journey, camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがメルフェイスを狙って会いに行くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance aims to meet Melphys,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロとふたりで出てくる、いかにも直前までセックスしていたような雰囲気・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys comes out with Jaro, and it looks as if they had been having sex until just before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスはあまり気分がよさそうではない、悲しそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys doesn't seem very happy; she looks sad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対象にジャロはすっきりで威張っている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the other hand, Jaro looks refreshed and arrogant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・むむむ、むかつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hmph, that's irritating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．"オーロラが居る"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: IF. "Aurora is here"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍レキシントン司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army Lexington headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーロラが侵入してアトランタ、ジュノーから情報を聞き出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aurora infiltrates and extracts information from Atlanta and Juno.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは偽者かも？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington might be an impostor?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、かなみか偵察部隊の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, Kanamika reconnaissance team reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４００ほどの魔物部隊が近くに居る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a demon unit of about 400 nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達を見つけ攻撃に来た訳ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They did not spot us and come to attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くにあるアペムンタ村を狙っているみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They seem to be targeting Apemunta Village nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アペムンタ村、確かにあるな、人口２００ほどの村か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apemunta Village, yes it exists, a village with about 200 people...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勢力範囲に飲み込まれたが逃げずにいるみたいだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was swallowed by the demon army's territory, but it seems they have not fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けにいきたい所だが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to help them, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿は魔人退治が優先ですと誰かに言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone tells that for Lord Rance, exterminating demons is the priority.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにこの後、幸福きゃんきゃんが涌くカクテル迷宮に寄る予定だったと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, it was planned to stop at the Cocktail Labyrinth where Happy Kyankyan spawns later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いますが寄り道すると涌き時間に間に合わなくなりますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They think that if they detour, they won't make it in time for spawn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロ（空気読めない男）、ぽつりという、ああアペムンタ村って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro (a guy who can't read the atmosphere) mutters, “Ah, Apemunta Village is...”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の故郷じゃなかった、メルフェイスよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your hometown, wasn't it, Melphys?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黙っているメルフェイス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys remains silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう・・メルフェイスちゃんの故郷か、これは、助けて恩を売るチャンスかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... Melphys's hometown, huh? This might be a chance to help and earn some favor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アペムンタ村に行く事に決めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decide to go to Apemunta Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスの方を見てウィンク（？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance looks at Melphys and winks (?).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村に行く途中、メルフェイスの故郷、アペムンタ村の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the village, talk about Melphys’s hometown, Apemunta Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカあたりが説明かな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps Chaka explains it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカは表面上の事は知っていますが、呪いの事は知りません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka knows the surface facts but not about the curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍属でなくその村の先生だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was not military, but a teacher in that village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５年前にヘルマン軍が来た際にその村も小数のヘルマン兵に襲われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Five years ago when the Helman army came, that village was also attacked by a small number of Helman soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、メルフェイスは魔法の力に覚醒してヘルマン軍を追い払う英雄となった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Melphys awakened magical powers and became a hero driving off the Helman army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでは魔法はほとんど知らなかったというのに天才とはこういう事を言うのだねとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though she hardly knew magic before, this is what you call a genius, they say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスはあまり話したくなさそうな感じ・・　いえ、私は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melphys seems reluctant to talk much... No, I...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （キャラ設定：メルフェイス参照）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Character setting: See Melphys)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村に到着する、周囲を魔軍が取り囲んでいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the village, which is surrounded by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 襲われる直前だったようだ、間に合った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like they were about to be attacked; they made it in time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けちらせーと攻撃をしかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They launch an attack shouting 'Drive them off!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵のリーダーは魔物隊長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy leader is the monster captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を率いていた魔物隊長が死に、魔軍は逃げて行った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain leading the demon army was killed, and the demon army retreated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に襲われると怯えていた村人が感謝してくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The villagers who had been afraid of monster attacks thank them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人の何人かがメルフェイスに気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some villagers notice Melphys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスより、メルフェイスに感謝する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They thank Melphys rather than Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の救世主、そして出世頭でもあるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is the village’s savior and most successful person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １５歳の少年アマデス君が現れる、メルフェイスとの再会に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A 15-year-old boy, Amades, appears, joyfully reunited with Melphys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 喜び慕ってくるが、ジャロが妨害する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is happy and adoring, but Jaro interferes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、俺の前にメルフェイスの面倒を見ていた少年てお前か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, you’re the boy who took care of Melphys before me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう必要ないんだよ、俺がいるからなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re no longer needed; because I’m here now.
